project.name: ubiquity-xforms
project.description: Ant project for the Ubiquity XForms javascript library, a cross- browser implementation of the W3C's XForms 1.1 recommendation. There do exist some other instances of build.xml at other levels in the directory hierarchy, but the intention going forwards is to gradually bring everything into this single top-level Ant project.

target.name: create-rollup
target.description: Creates the rolled-up version of the library.
